FORM.SCRIPT: local kWnd = UISelf local kScreenSize = GetScreenSize() local kPos = kWnd:GetLocation() kPos:SetX( (kScreenSize:GetX() - kWnd:GetSize():GetX() ) / 2 ) kPos:SetY( (kScreenSize:GetY() - kWnd:GetSize():GetY() ) / 2 ) kWnd:SetLocation( kPos )

local Menu = false if( CheckNil(g_world == nil) ) then return false end if( CheckNil(g_world:IsNil()) ) then return false end
if Menu == false then UnLockPlayerInputMove(3) if g_world:GetMapNo() ~= 9910100 then UnLockPlayerInput(1) end UnLockPlayerInput(3) UnLockPlayerInput(6) UnLockPlayerInput(7) UnLockPlayerInput(8) g_bEnableShortCutKey = true end
